name: MyTP Snowboarding 2
description:
MyTP Snowboarding continues – featuring completely new slopes with tons of kickers, boxes and rails… smooth & technical halfpipe riding… big air events… individual characters... ONLINE MULTIPLAYER…picture export…replay option…VIRTUAL PHOTO SHOOT and much more ! Welcome the most realistic snowboard feeling for your iPhone®, iPod touch® & iPad™ !

Start your virtual snowboard season right now and try MyTP Snowboarding 2 for FREE – learn new tricks in the mountains of Flachauwinkl, Austria, visit Mountain High in Southern California, USA or show your skills in LAAX surrounded by the Swiss Alps. Visit the largest freestyle sports event in Europe – freestyle.ch - in Zurich and show us your technical double corks and your personalized style trick to be the freestyle.champ! Join the TransWorld SNOWboarding photo session and try to make it to the cover of the magazine !
Ride wherever and whatever you want – from freeriding in the dreamland of Alaska, the terrain park at the shapetools.ch session to the halfpipe BestTrick Session – MyTP Snowboarding 2 gives you all the possibilites.

You can play with your own “styled” character - Would you like to ride as a girl or guy, goofy or regular ? No problem ! It`s your decision.
There is just one question left: on which board will you stomp your first triple cork 1620°?


FULL PACKAGE FEATURES

+++ Full content of all resorts – bigger and longer slopes which will please you with more kickers, boxes, rails and halfpipes. Try to beat the highscores!

+++ Full competition spectrum – Get the chance to move on at the events and sessions. Is your riding good enough for the final round? Impress us!

+++ Full stuff choice - choose a character, select a jacket and take a board that meets your taste. Your riding - your style!

VISIT US to see whats coming up next and get tips & more… – mytpsnowboarding.com

FOLLOW US – twitter.com/mytpsnowboard
LIKE US – facebook.com/mytpsnowboarding
WATCH US – youtube.com/randerline


*** COMPATIBLE DEVICES ***
MyTP Snowboarding 2 is compatible with 3rd (32GB & 64GB) and 4th generation iPod touch, iPhone 3GS and iPhone 4.

***IMPORTANT NOTICE***
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)mytpsnowboarding.com. You may also contact us by visiting one of our websites - MyTPsnowboarding.com or randerline.com. We will read and account for all reviews here, but we can only answer and help you via email. Thank you.


*************************************************************
Don't miss out on our BRAND NEW game DMBX - Mountain Biking !!!
